idea: Envent Biologic was founded by a group of professionals with Animal Science educational background with an ideology to provide cost effective but high quality products to shrimp farmers across the country. Shrimp farming (Aquaculture) is one of the leading foreign exchange generating industry with very less knowledge of science behind shrimp farming. Farmers adopt semi-intensive shrimp farming and various inputs for the same are needed from time to time. Early entrants in the manufacturing and marketing of Aquaculture Healthcare Inputs took advantage of high price paying customer mindset and kept the margins of their products very high while exploiting the farmers. Now, when international prices for shrimp are tumbling these high prices reduce the profitability of the farmers to a huge extent leading them to humongous losses. We, at Envent Biologic, have a clear vision of brining high quality shrimp healthcare products at very affordable prices to uplift the farmers and enhance their profitability.
name: Envent Biologic

idea:

We strive to create an environment that encourages working professionals and students to make optimum use of their time and excel in their careers. With an exceptional blend of experienced professors and state-of-art technology, we are confident that CareerTopper will assist you to BROADEN YOUR FINANCIAL HORIZON!
Founded in 2015, CareerTopper has grown from an e-learning platform to a multi-faceted Company providing Training Solutions and Skill Development Programs to professionals, domestic institutions, corporates and international clients.www.careertopper.com

idea:

idea: We are building a SaaS trucking operations and financial management platform, with a focus on data products and sciences. Our aim is to resolve long-standing systemic issues in trucking by taking a full stack view of operational concerns, including financial management as well as business and market intelligence.  Our platform provides a simple, secure, scalable and integrated technology solution that endeavours to address the above.

idea: IndiaCalls in the Search Engine Platform for the Social Sector. This unique platform reaches out to the multitude of information on the social sector. Connecting small  grass-root groups with big time donors is just one of the initiative. Enabling unfortunate people find generous benefactors as well as other social events, programs, CSR, awards (how to apply for them) are just some of the initiatives planned. This will be through a 3 pronged approached - Telephone based, web based and App based. An interactive phone based information provides the customer the edge.
